author: WLWT Digital Staff
title: Ohio Gov. DeWine calls for state agencies to prepare for possible Ukrainian resettlement

sentence: COLUMBUS, Ohio (WKBN)- Ohio Governor Mike DeWine plans on welcoming Ukrainian refugees into Ohio.
author: Michael Reiner
title: DeWine urges Ukrainian refugees to come to Ohio

sentence: (COLUMBUS, Ohio)—Ohio Governor Mike DeWine today has directed the Ohio Department of Job and Family Services (ODJFS) to convene a summit of various service organizations to ensure Ohio’s preparedness to welcome Ukrainian refugees, if asked.
title: DeWine Calls for Summit of Refugee Organizations to Plan for Possible Ukrainian Resettlement

author: Kaylyn Hlavaty
title: Groups from around state attend summit in Parma to prepare for possibility of Ukrainian refugees

author: WLWT Digital Staff
title: Ohio leaders host summit to prepare to welcome any Ukrainian refugees
